string.name: wp_friendsandfamilyupdates_tutorial_overview
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the patient to the updates activity. %%FRIENDSANDFAMILYUPDATES is replaced with the name of the activity.

resources.string: %%FRIENDSANDFAMILYUPDATES helps you stay connected with your friends and family. You can send them updates about your visit to keep them informed, and they can send you e-cards during your visit to wish you well.

string.name: wp_friendsandfamilyupdates_tutorial_overview_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the patient proxy to the updates activity %%FRIENDSANDFAMILYUPDATES is replaced with the name of the activity.

resources.string: %%FRIENDSANDFAMILYUPDATES helps you stay connected with %%PATNAME throughout their visit. %%PATNAME can send updates about their visit to keep you informed, and you can send e-cards during their visit to wish them well.

string.name: wp_friendsandfamilyupdates_tutorial_overview_2
string.context: Tutorial text explaining to the patient who can see the updates in this activity

resources.string: Your care team will not see these updates or e-cards. Only people who you have invited to have access to your chart can view these.

string.name: wp_friendsandfamilyupdates_tutorial_overview_proxy_2
string.context: Tutorial text explaining to the patient proxy who can see the updates in this activity

resources.string: %%PATNAME\'s care team will not see these updates or e-cards. Only people who %%PATNAME has invited to have access to their chart can view these.
